form.title: CLIENT INTAKE

hero.description: Help us understand your business and creative vision. No wrong answers, the more honest you are, the stronger your brand will be.

form.draftBanner: You have a saved draft, your previous answers have been restored.

cta.note: Your answers are auto-saved in your browser so you can return and edit anytime. We'll review your submission and reach out within 2 business days.

q1.label: Describe your business in 2-3 sentences, as if explaining it to a stranger at dinner.
q1.hint: Avoid jargon. Focus on what you do, who you serve, and why it matters.
q1.placeholder: We help independent therapists build a practice that feels like them...

q2.label: What problem do you solve, and what does life look like for your customer after working with you?
q2.hint: Think transformation: the before and after.
q2.placeholder: Before: they struggle with... After: they feel...

q3.label: Paint a vivid picture of your ideal customer.
q3.hint: Age, lifestyle, values, aspirations, what they read, how they spend their weekends.
q3.placeholder: She's in her early 40s, runs a small creative business, values authenticity over trends...

q4.label: List 2-4 competitors or similar brands. What do they do well, and where's the gap you fill?
q4.hint: These don't need to be direct competitors, any brand your audience might also consider.
q4.placeholder: Brand A is strong at X, but feels too cold. We differentiate by...

q5.label: If your brand were a person, how would they walk into a room?
q5.hint: Presence, tone of voice, how they dress, how they make people feel. All personality, no product.
q5.placeholder: Confident but never arrogant. They speak slowly and deliberately...

q6.label: Where does your brand sit on these personality spectrums?
q6.hint: 1 = far left, 5 = far right. Go with your gut.

q7.label: What are your core values? (The 3-5 that define how you operate.)
q7.hint: The beliefs that drive decisions even when it's costly.

q8.label: Describe your positioning in one sentence. (Complete: "We are the [category] that [differentiator]...")
q8.hint: Your positioning in one line. Rough is fine, just try.
q8.placeholder: We are the personal branding agency that helps therapists become thought leaders in their niche...

q9.label: Imagine it's 3 years from now. What has your brand achieved? How are people talking about you?
q9.hint: Long-term vision inspires both your work and your audience.
q9.placeholder: Therapists in our network are known as leaders...

q10.label: List 3-5 brands you genuinely admire, including their approach, visuals, community, or energy.
q10.hint: Logos, websites, packaging, editorial layouts, even spaces. Links or names both work.

q11.label: List 2-3 brands whose approach you actively dislike or want to avoid.
q11.hint: Knowing what to avoid is just as valuable as knowing what to pursue.

q12.label: What colors, palettes, or color stories resonate with your brand?
q12.placeholder: Warm earth tones, ocean blues, modern neutrals with pops of accent...

q13.label: Are there colors you want to avoid?
q13.hint: Due to personal preference, industry association, or competitor use.
q13.placeholder: Avoid: bright neon, corporate blue, overly pastel...

q14.label: What typography styles resonate with your brand? (Serif, sans-serif, geometric, organic, playful, serious?)
q14.hint: Fonts reflect your voice. Choose the character you want to project.
q14.placeholder: Clean modern sans-serif with a handwritten accent font...

q15.hint: Think about texture, attitude, and energy. Focus on the overall feel, not just keywords.
q15.label: Paint a visual aesthetic direction for your brand.
q15.placeholder: Minimal, natural, warm, inviting. Think Scandinavian design meets cozy coffee shop...

q15Description.label: Any additional aesthetic notes?
q15Description.placeholder: Avoid: stock photography, cluttered layouts, cold corporate feel...

q16.label: If your brand were a physical space, what would it look like and feel like?
q16.hint: Materials, lighting, atmosphere. This reveals your brand's texture beyond a screen.
q16.placeholder: Warm lighting, wooden furniture, plants, quiet jazz playing, well-organized shelves...

q17.label: Do you have any existing brand assets (logo, colors, fonts, patterns) you want to keep or evolve?
q17.hint: If starting fresh, write "none." If keeping elements, explain what and why.
q17.placeholder: We have a current logo but want to modernize it...

q18.label: What deliverables do you need? (Logo, brand guidelines, social templates, website updates, etc.)
q18.hint: Select all that apply, we'll confirm scope during our kickoff call.
q18.placeholder: Logo, brand guidelines, social media templates, email signature...

q19.label: What's the one thing you most want people to feel when they first encounter your brand?
q19.hint: A single word or short phrase is perfect.

q21.label: Anything else we should know before we begin?
q21.hint: Fears, strong preferences, past branding experiences, or anything that feels important.
q21.placeholder: The last agency gave us something too generic. We really want this to feel like us...

q20.label: Got any logos, photos, or moodboards that inspire your brand's direction? Drop them here — the more I see what moves you, the better I can design for you.
q20.hint: Up to 8 images. PNG, JPG, WEBP, or GIF.
q20.uploadLimit: Up to 8 images · PNG, JPG, WEBP, GIF

duplicate.title: Duplicate Submission
duplicate.message: You've already sent a submission for this brand. Would you like to override the previous submission or send a completely new one?

clearConfirm.title: Clear Form
clearConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear all fields? This cannot be undone.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Submission
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.

messages.submitSuccess: Thanks! Your form was submitted and files were emailed successfully.
messages.submitSuccessLocal: Thanks! Your form was submitted and saved locally for dashboard testing.
messages.clearSuccess: Form cleared. Your draft has been removed from the browser.

header.title: Client Submissions
header.subtitle: Manage and review all intake submissions

toolbar.search: Search by brand, client, or email...

empty.title: No submissions yet
empty.message: Submissions will appear here once they are submitted.

logoUpload.title: Logo Upload
logoUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your logo here or click to browse
logoUpload.errorSize: File size exceeds 5MB. Please choose a smaller file.
logoUpload.errorFormat: Invalid file format. Please upload PNG, JPG, or SVG.
